# 召唤天使

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/zhaohuan-tianshi
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/zhaohuan-tianshi
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install zhaohuan-tianshi
zhaohuan-tianshi <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g zhaohuan-tianshi
zhaohuan-tianshi <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
